vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
OZStorage._balances (OZStorage.sol#12) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOf (OZStorage.sol#25-27)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
OZStorage._allowed (OZStorage.sol#14) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- _allowance (OZStorage.sol#29-31)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
OZStorage._totalSupply (OZStorage.sol#16) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (OZStorage.sol#21-23)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
OZStorage._guardCounter should be constant (OZStorage.sol#19)
OZStorage._totalSupply should be constant (OZStorage.sol#16)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in OZStorage.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.5.8 (OZStorage.sol#3): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_investor' of OZStorage.balanceOf (OZStorage.sol#25) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
